edu.crypto2.transformations
Class InvMetaTransformation

java.lang.Object
  edu.crypto2.transformations.InvMetaTransformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transformation
public class InvMetaTransformation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transformation

Class InvMetaTransformation

Task:
To decrypt Test Vector according to selected algorithm, and to reverse MetaTransformation.
Uses bash interpreter to interpret Java code that represent transformation

Field Summary
 int Nb
          Nb is always 4 (by FIPS-197), but authors of AES left the space to change something in the future, so we will do the same
 
Constructor Summary
InvMetaTransformation()
          Dummy constructor.
Task:
Just to set Nb to 4

Method Detail

initialize_State

public void initialize_State(java.lang.String testVector,
                             int key_len,
                             java.lang.String init_key)
initialize_State

Task:
Fills State array with initial values taken from testVector and expand key according to key_len and init_key variables.
Input variables must satisfy following conditions:

Parameters:
testVector - testVector - 32 alphanumercis with hex values (16 bytes)
key_len - key_len=128 => length(init_key)=16 bytes
key_len=192 => length(init_key)=24 bytes
key_len=256 => length(init_key)=32 bytes
init_key - - initial key to be expanded Resulting key will be stored in Data.Key variable

transform_state

public java.lang.String transform_state(java.lang.String testVector,
                                        int key_len,
                                        java.lang.String init_key,
                                        java.lang.String MetaTr)
transform_state
Task:
Process meta transformation stored in MetaTr string using BeanShell.

Parameters:
testVector - - transformation input
key_len - - 128, 192 or 256
init_key - - initial key to expand
MetaTr - - meta transformation string. If set to "TEST", then just for testing
Input variables must satisfy following conditions:
testVector - 32 alphanumercis with hex values (16 bytes)
key_len=128 => length(init_key)=16 bytes
key_len=192 => length(init_key)=24 bytes
key_len=256 => length(init_key)=32 bytes
